summary: Removes the effects of gravity from bolts + Makes them go faster
descriptionHtml:
Removes the effects of gravity from bolts + Makes them go faster

I made this mod impressed by

No Gravity Arrows by Graxster
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/686

I double the speed of bolts (Default 5400 ->10800)

Bolts that changed by this mod

	Dwarven Bolt
	Exploding Dwarven Bolt of Fire
	Exploding Dwarven Bolt of Ice
	Exploding Dwarven Bolt of Shock
	Exploding Steel Bolt of Fire
	Exploding Steel Bolt of Ice
	Exploding Steel Bolt of Shock
	Steel Bolt

Put this option on Skyrim.ini

[Combat]
f1PboltTiltUpAngle=0.0

Require Dawnguard
author: CowEye
